trans-unit.source: Adding a FULLTEXT index to a table that does not have a user-defined FTS_DOC_ID column will require the table to be rebuilt once. When the table is rebuilt, the system adds a hidden FTS_DOC_ID column. From that point forward, adding additional FULLTEXT indexes to the same table will not require the table to be rebuilt when ALGORITHM is set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: 向不具有用户定义的 FTS_DOC_ID 列的表中添加 FULLTEXT 索引将需要重建该表一次。重建表后，系统将添加一个隐藏的 FTS_DOC_ID 列。从那时起，将 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 时，向同一表中添加其他 FULLTEXT 索引将不需要重建该表。

trans-unit.source: Adding a FULLTEXT index to a table that does not have a user-defined FTS_DOC_ID column will require the table to be rebuilt once. When the table is rebuilt, the system adds a hidden FTS_DOC_ID column. This initial operation will have to be performed with ALGORITHM set to INPLACE.From that point forward, adding additional FULLTEXT indexes to the same table will not require the table to be rebuilt, and ALGORITHM can be set to NOCOPY.
trans-unit.target: 向不具有用户定义的 FTS_DOC_ID 列的表中添加 FULLTEXT 索引将需要重建该表一次。重建表时，系统将添加一个隐藏的 FTS_DOC_ID 列。此初始操作必须在 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 的情况下执行。从那时起，向同一表添加其他 FULLTEXT 索引将不需要重建该表，而 ALGORITHM 可以设置为 NOCOPY 。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, MariaDB 10.0.5 introduced three new functions that work with regular expressions: REGEXP_REPLACE(), REGEXP_INSTR() and REGEXP_SUBSTR().
trans-unit.target: 此外，MariaDB 10.0.5引入了三个可与正则表达式一起使用的新函数：REGEXP_REPLACE（），REGEXP_INSTR（）和REGEXP_SUBSTR（）。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, internal on-disk tables are in the Aria table format instead of the MyISAM table format. This should speed up some GROUP BY and DISTINCT queries because Aria has better caching than MyISAM.
trans-unit.target: 此外，内部磁盘表采用Aria表格式而不是MyISAM表格式。这将加快某些GROUP BY和DISTINCT查询的速度，因为Aria具有比MyISAM更好的缓存。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, one can choose to encrypt XtraDB/InnoDB log files (recommended).
trans-unit.target: 此外,可以选择加密XtraDB/InnoDB日志文件(推荐)。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the “accept” option permit to keep those ill formatted lines with the bad field, and all succeeding fields of the record, nullified. If “accept” is specified without “maxerr”, all ill formatted lines will be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 另外，“ accept”选项允许将那些格式错误的行与坏字段以及记录的所有后续字段都保留为无效。如果指定的“ accept”不带“ maxerr”，则所有格式错误的行都将被接受。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the application generates reports analyzing transaction activities. These reports are adapted for categories of customers (business, student, regular checking, savings) or for types of transactions (cash deposits, checks, ATM deposits, in-branch deposits, transfers, withdrawals). These reports can be run by the customers on their individual accounts or by the bank's back office on all customer activities.
trans-unit.target: 此外,该应用程序还可生成分析交易活动的报告。这些报告根据客户类别(企业、学生、普通支票、储蓄)或交易类型(现金存款、支票、ATM存款、分行存款、转账、取款)进行调整。这些报告可以由客户对其个人账户进行操作,也可以由银行后台对所有客户活动进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, they are available in most other handler methods: the attributes are stored in the .frm file and on every open MySQL makes them available to the engine by filling the corresponding option_struct members of the table, fields, and keys.
trans-unit.target: 另外，它们在大多数其他处理程序方法中可用：这些属性存储在 .frm 文件中，并且在每个打开的MySQL上，通过填充表，字段和键的相应 option_struct 成员，这些属性对引擎可用。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this server converts MariaDB Server query plans into ColumnStore query plan format. This format is essentially a parse tree, but adds execution hints from the optimizer to assist the User Module in converting the parse tree to a Job List.
trans-unit.target: 此外,该服务器还将MariaDB Server查询计划转换为ColumnStore查询计划格式。这种格式本质上是一个解析树,但增加了优化器的执行提示,以帮助用户模块将解析树转换为作业列表。

trans-unit.source: After a temporary split, if the 'good' part of the cluster was still reachable and its state was modified, resynchronization occurs. As a part of it, nodes of the 'bad' part of the cluster drop all client connections. It might be quite unexpected, especially if the client was idle and did not even know anything wrong was happening. Please also note that after the connection to the isolated node is restored, if there is a flow on the node, it takes a long time for it to synchronize, during which the "good" node says that the cluster is already of the normal size and synced, while the rejoining node says it's only joined (but not synced). The connections keep getting 'unknown command'. It should pass eventually.
trans-unit.target: 在临时拆分后,如果集群的 "好 "部分仍然可以到达,并且它的状态被修改,则会发生重新同步。作为其中的一部分,集群的 "坏 "部分的节点会放弃所有的客户端连接。这可能很出乎意料,尤其是当客户端处于空闲状态,甚至不知道发生了什么问题的时候。还请注意,恢复与隔离节点的连接后,如果节点上有流量,需要很长时间才能同步,期间 "好 "节点说集群已经达到正常规模并同步了,而重新加入的节点说只是加入了(但没有同步)。连接的时候一直收到'未知命令'。最终应该会通过。

trans-unit.source: After adding a DBRoot, it must be assigned to a Performance Module before it can be used. Use the mcsadmin assignDbrootPmConfig command to do so. Note: The Performance Module that the DBRoot is being assigned to must to Manually Offline. The system must be in a STOPPED state

trans-unit.source: After every transaction COMMIT, the server normally has to flush any changes the transaction made to the InnoDB redo log and the binary log to disk (i.e. by calling system calls such as fsync() or fdatasync() or similar). This helps ensure that the data changes made by the transaction are stored durably on the disk. Disk flushing is a time-consuming operation, and can easily impose limits on throughput in terms of the number of transactions-per-second (TPS) which can be committed.
trans-unit.target: 在每次事务 COMMIT 之后，服务器通常必须将对InnoDB重做日志和二进制日志所做的任何更改刷新到磁盘（即，通过调用诸如 fsync() 或 fdatasync() 之类的系统调用）。这有助于确保通过事务进行的数据更改被持久存储在磁盘上。磁盘刷新是一项耗时的操作，并且可以根据每秒可提交的事务数（TPS）轻松限制吞吐量。

trans-unit.source: After preparing a statement with PREPARE, you execute it with an EXECUTE statement that refers to the prepared statement name. If the prepared statement contains any parameter markers, you must supply a USING clause that lists user variables containing the values to be bound to the parameters. Parameter values can be supplied only by user variables, and the USING clause must name exactly as many variables as the number of parameter markers in the statement.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PREPARE 准备语句之后，可以使用引用准备好的语句名称的 EXECUTE 语句执行该语句。如果准备好的语句包含任何参数标记，则必须提供 USING 子句，该子句列出包含要绑定到参数的值的用户变量。参数值只能由用户变量提供，并且 USING 子句的命名变量必须与语句中参数标记的数量一样多。

trans-unit.source: After printing the report to screen, email the report to ADDRESS. This option requires sendmail in /usr/sbin/, therefore it does not work on Windows. /usr/sbin/sendmail can be a sym link to qmail, for example, or any MTA that emulates sendmail's -t command line option and operation. The FROM: field is "mysqlreport", SUBJECT: is "MySQL status report".
trans-unit.target: 将报告打印到屏幕上后,将报告通过电子邮件发送至ADDRESS。这个选项需要在/usr/sbin/中安装sendmail,因此在Windows上无法使用。例如,/usr/sbin/sendmail可以是qmail的sym链接,或者任何模拟sendmail的-t命令行选项和操作的MTA。FROM:字段是 "mysqlreport",SUBJECT:是 "MySQL状态报告"。

trans-unit.source: After printing the report to screen, print the report to FILE too. Internally, mysqlreport always writes the report to a temp file first: /tmp/mysqlreport.PID on *nix, c:sqlreport.PID on Windows (PID is the script's process ID). Then it prints the temp file to screen. Then if --outfile is specified, the temp file is copied to OUTFILE. After --email (above), the temp file is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 将报告打印到屏幕后，也将报告打印到FILE。在内部，mysqlreport始终始终首先将报告写入临时文件：* nix上的 /tmp/mysqlreport.PID ,Windows上的 c:sqlreport.PID （PID是脚本的进程ID）。然后将临时文件打印到屏幕上。然后，如果指定了 --outfile ，则将临时文件复制到OUTFILE。 --email 之后（上面），临时文件将被删除。

trans-unit.source: After the audit plugin has been installed and loaded, there will be some new global variables within MariaDB. These can be used to configure many components, limits, and methods related to auditing the server. You may set these variables related to the logs, such as their location, size limits, rotation parameters, and method of logging information. You may also set what information is logged, such connects, disconnects, and failed attempts to connect. You can also have the audit plugin log queries, read and write access to tables. So as not to overload your logs, the audit plugin can be configured based on lists of users. You can include or exclude the activities of specific users in the logs.
trans-unit.target: 在安装并加载审计插件后,在MariaDB中会有一些新的全局变量,这些变量可以用来配置许多与审计服务器相关的组件、限制和方法。这些变量可以用来配置许多与审计服务器相关的组件、限制和方法。你可以设置这些与日志相关的变量,比如日志的位置、大小限制、轮换参数和记录信息的方法。你还可以设置记录哪些信息,比如连接、断开连接和连接失败的尝试。你还可以让审计插件记录查询、读写表的访问情况。为了不使你的日志过载,审计插件可以根据用户列表进行配置。您可以在日志中包含或排除特定用户的活动。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate
trans-unit.target: Aggregate

trans-unit.source: Aggregate Functions
trans-unit.target: 聚合函数

trans-unit.source: Aggregate Functions as Window Functions
trans-unit.target: 聚合函数作为窗口函数

trans-unit.source: Aggregate UDF functions can be used as window functions.
trans-unit.target: 集合UDF函数可用作窗口函数。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate data in a SELECT statement with the GROUP BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 在SELECT语句中用GROUP BY子句聚合数据。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate function '%-.192s)' of SELECT #%d belongs to SELECT #%d
trans-unit.target: SELECT #%d的聚合函数'%-.192s)'属于SELECT #%d。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions are summary functions such as SUM() and AVG().
trans-unit.target: 聚合函数是摘要函数，例如SUM（）和AVG（）。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions are utilized for window functions however differ in behavior from a group by query because the rows remain ungrouped. This provides support for cumulative sums and rolling averages, for example.
trans-unit.target: 聚合函数被用于窗口函数,但是在行为上与按查询分组不同,因为行保持未分组。例如,这就提供了对累计总和和滚动平均的支持。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions cannot be used in the RETURNING clause. Since aggregate functions work on a set of values and if the purpose is to get the row count, ROW_COUNT() with SELECT can be used, or it can be used in REPLACE...SELECT...RETURNING if the table in the RETURNING clause is not the same as the REPLACE table.
trans-unit.target: 聚合函数不能在RETURNING子句中使用。因为聚合函数是工作在一组值上的,如果目的是获取行数,可以使用带有SELECT的ROW_COUNT(),如果RETURNING子句中的表与REPLACE表不一样,也可以在REPLACE...SELECT...RETURNING中使用。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions cannot be used in the RETURNING clause. Since aggregate functions work on a set of values, and if the purpose is to get the row count, ROW_COUNT() with SELECT can be used or it can be used in INSERT...SELECT...RETURNING if the table in the RETURNING clause is not the same as the INSERT table.
trans-unit.target: 聚合函数不能在RETURNING子句中使用。因为聚合函数是工作在一组值上的,如果目的是获取行数,可以使用带有SELECT的ROW_COUNT(),如果RETURNING子句中的表与INSERT表不一样,也可以在INSERT...SELECT...RETURNING中使用。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions that are currently supported as window functions are: COUNT, SUM, AVG, BIT_OR, BIT_AND, BIT_XOR.
trans-unit.target: 当前支持作为窗口函数的聚合函数是：COUNT，SUM，AVG，BIT_OR，BIT_AND，BIT_XOR。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions used with GROUP BY clauses.
trans-unit.target: 与GROUP BY子句一起使用的聚合函数。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions with the DISTINCT specifier (e.g. COUNT( DISTINCT x)) are not supported as window functions.
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数不支持使用 DISTINCT 说明符的聚合函数（例如 COUNT( DISTINCT x) ）。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate functions, such as SUM and AVG ignore NULLs.
trans-unit.target: 聚合函数（例如SUM和AVG）会忽略NULL。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate table I/O wait events by index.
trans-unit.target: 按索引汇总表I/O等待事件。

trans-unit.source: Aggregate table I/O wait events by table.
trans-unit.target: 按表汇总表I/O等待事件。

trans-unit.target: 按表汇总表锁等待事件。

trans-unit.source: Aggregates object wait events
trans-unit.target: 汇总对象的等待事件

trans-unit.target: 按套接字实例汇总所有套接字I/O操作的定时器和字节数统计。

trans-unit.source: Aggregation performance is also influenced by the number of distinct aggregate column values. Generally you'll see that for the same number of rows 100 distinct values will compute faster than 10000 distinct values. This is due to increased memory management as well as transfer overhead.
trans-unit.target: 聚合性能还受到不同的聚合列值数量的影响。一般来说,你会发现,对于同样数量的行,100个不同的值会比10000个不同的值计算得更快。这是由于内存管理以及传输开销的增加。

trans-unit.source: Aggressive mode of in-order parallel replication is very similar to optimistic mode. The main difference is that the slave does not consider whether transactions conflicted on the master when deciding whether to apply the transactions in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 进取模式的顺序并行复制与乐观模式非常相似。主要区别在于,从机在决定是否并行应用事务时,不考虑事务在主机上是否冲突。

trans-unit.source: Aggressive mode of in-order parallel replication was introduced in MariaDB 10.1.3.
trans-unit.target: 有序并行复制的积极模式在MariaDB 10.1.3中引入。

trans-unit.source: All field formats (except the first one) are a one-character specification[4]. 'X' is equivalent to not specifying the field format. trans-unit.source: All option file names must end in .cnf on Unix-like operating systems. On Windows, all option file names must end in .cnf or .ini.
trans-unit.target: 在 .cnf Unix的操作系统上，所有选项文件名都必须以.cnf结尾。在Windows上，所有选项文件名都必须以 .cnf 或 .ini 结尾。

trans-unit.source: All other classes match the SQLEXCEPTION keyword. The default MYSQL_ERRNO is 1644 and default MESSAGE_TEXT is 'Unhandled user-defined exception condition'.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他类都匹配SQLEXCEPTION关键字。默认的MYSQL_ERRNO是1644,默认的MESSAGE_TEXT是'Unhandled user-defined exception condition'。

trans-unit.source: All other master-related variables are global and affect either only the '' connections or all connections. For example, Slave_retried_transactions now shows the total number of retried transactions over all slaves.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他与主机相关的变量都是全局变量，并且仅影响''连接或所有连接。例如，Slave_retried_transactions现在显示所有从属上重试的事务总数。

trans-unit.source: All other systems: OFF
trans-unit.target: 所有其他系统： OFF

trans-unit.source: All packages should be install as root user or use 'sudo' command when installing as non-root uster
trans-unit.target: 所有的软件包都应该以root用户的身份安装,如果以非root用户的身份安装,则使用'sudo'命令。

trans-unit.source: All partitions must use the same storage engine. For a workaround, see Using CONNECT - Partitioning and Sharding.
trans-unit.target: 所有分区必须使用相同的存储引擎。有关解决方法，请参阅使用CONNECT-分区和分片。

trans-unit.source: All partitions of a SPIDER table can also live on the same machine. In this case there will be a small overhead (SPIDER will use connections to localhost), but queries that read multiple partitions will use parallel threads.
trans-unit.target: 一个SPIDER表的所有分区也可以存在于同一台机器上。在这种情况下,会有一个小的开销(SPIDER将使用连接到localhost),但读取多个分区的查询将使用并行线程。

trans-unit.source: All parts of a PRIMARY KEY must be NOT NULL; if you need NULL in a key, use UNIQUE instead
trans-unit.target: PRIMARY KEY的所有部分必须是NOT NULL;如果你需要在一个键中使用NULL,请使用UNIQUE来代替。

trans-unit.source: All parts of a SPATIAL index must be NOT NULL
trans-unit.target: SPATIAL索引的所有部分必须非空。

trans-unit.source: All paths
trans-unit.target: 所有路径

trans-unit.source: All paths to which a particular disk has been mounted are reported. The rationale is that someone might want to take different action e.g. depending on which disk is relevant for a particular path. This leads to the same disk being reported multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 报告所有挂载了特定磁盘的路径。这样做的理由是,有人可能想采取不同的行动,例如,根据哪个磁盘与特定路径相关。这将导致同一磁盘被多次报告。

trans-unit.source: All privileges that are specific to a stored routine will be dropped when a DROP FUNCTION or DROP ROUTINE is run. However, if a CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION or CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE is used to drop and replace and the routine, any privileges specific to that routine will not be dropped.
trans-unit.target: 运行DROP FUNCTION或DROP ROUTINE时，将删除所有特定于存储例程的特权。但是，如果使用CREATE或REPLACE FUNCTION或CREATE或REPLACE PROCEDURE来删除和替换例程，则该例程专用的任何特权都不会删除。

trans-unit.source: All relational operations can be applied to this table. The table (and the file) can be updated, inserted and conditionally deleted. The only constraint is that when inserting values, the section name must be the first in the list of values.
trans-unit.target: 所有的关系操作都可以应用于此表。该表(和文件)可以被更新、插入和有条件地删除。唯一的限制是,在插入值时,节名必须是值列表中的第一个。

trans-unit.source: All remaining read queries route to any MariaDB Server (OLTP)
trans-unit.target: 所有剩余的读取查询路由到任何MariaDB服务器(OLTP)。

trans-unit.source: All remaining read queries will route to any MariaDB Server.
trans-unit.target: 所有剩余的读取查询将路由到任何MariaDB服务器。

trans-unit.source: All required MariaDB packages are included on the media, so there is no need for an Internet connection.
trans-unit.target: 所有需要的MariaDB包都包含在媒体上,所以不需要互联网连接。

trans-unit.source: All rows after the current row (UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING), for example RANGE BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
trans-unit.target: 当前行之后的所有行（“未绑定”），例如“当前行 RANGE BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING

trans-unit.source: All rows before the current row (UNBOUNDED PRECEDING), for example RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
trans-unit.target: 当前行之前的所有行（UNBOUNDED PRECEDING），例如 RANGE BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW

trans-unit.source: All rows contain the same value.
trans-unit.target: 所有的行都包含相同的值。

trans-unit.source: All session connection attributes.
trans-unit.target: 所有会话连接属性。

trans-unit.source: All spatial data types
trans-unit.target: 所有空间数据类型

trans-unit.source: All statements are profiled except SHOW PROFILES and SHOW PROFILE, so you will find neither of those statements in the profile list. Malformed statements are profiled. For example, SHOW PROFILING is an illegal statement, and a syntax error occurs if you try to execute it, but it will show up in the profiling list.
trans-unit.target: 除了 SHOW PROFILES 和 SHOW PROFILE 之外，所有语句都已配置文件，因此您在配置文件列表中都找不到这两个语句。分析格式错误的语句。例如， SHOW PROFILING 是非法语句，并且如果您尝试执行它，则会发生语法错误，但是它将显示在概要分析列表中。

trans-unit.source: All statements in ColumnStore run at a particular version (or, snapshot) of the database, which the system refers to as the System Change Number, (SCN).
trans-unit.target: ColumnStore中的所有语句都是在数据库的特定版本(或,快照)下运行的,系统将其称为系统变更号,(SCN)。

trans-unit.source: All string columns with a length of four or more are dynamic.
trans-unit.target: 所有长度为4以上的字符串列都是动态的。

trans-unit.source: All subsequent calls to any FederatedX table using the 'server_one' will now be against db2.t1! Guess what? You no longer have to perform an alter table in order to point one or more FederatedX tables to a new server!
trans-unit.target: 所有后续使用'server_one'对任何FederatedX表的调用,现在都将针对db2.t1! 你猜怎么着?你再也不用为了把一个或多个FederatedX表指向一个新的服务器而执行改变表的操作了。

trans-unit.source: All tables in all catalogs and all schemas
trans-unit.target: 所有目录和所有模式中的所有表格。

trans-unit.source: All tables in the join was optimized away. This happens when we are only using COUNT(*), MIN() and MAX() functions in the SELECT and we where able to replace all of these with constants.
trans-unit.target: 联接中的所有表均已优化。当我们仅在 SELECT 中使用 COUNT(*) ， MIN() 和 MAX() 函数，并且我们能够用常量替换所有这些函数时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: All tables in the test schema
trans-unit.target: 测试模式中的所有表

trans-unit.source: All tables should have a primary key (multi-column primary keys are supported). DELETE operations are unsupported on tables without a primary key. Also, rows in tables without a primary key may appear in a different order on different nodes.
trans-unit.target: 所有表都应具有主键（支持多列主键）。没有主键的表不支持DELETE操作。同样，没有主键的表中的行在不同节点上的显示顺序可能不同。

trans-unit.source: All tables used in a query cache entry
trans-unit.target: 查询缓存条目中使用的所有表格

trans-unit.source: All the above strategies can be controlled via the following switches in optimizer_switch system variable.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过optimizer_switch系统变量中的以下开关来控制所有上述策略。

trans-unit.source: All the algorithms given below are "fast", but most introduce flaws:
trans-unit.target: 下面给出的所有算法都很 "快",但大多数算法都会引入缺陷。

trans-unit.source: All the dependent packages have been installed.
trans-unit.target: 所有依赖的软件包都已安装完毕。

trans-unit.source: All the following DATE literals are valid, and they all represent the same value:
trans-unit.target: 以下所有 DATE 文字均有效，并且它们都表示相同的值：

trans-unit.source: All the following examples are valid:
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子都是有效的。

trans-unit.source: All the names in alphabetical order:
trans-unit.target: 所有名字按字母顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: All the options in your original MySQL my.cnf file should work fine for MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 原始MySQL my.cnf 文件中的所有选项对于MariaDB都可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: All the specified columns are compared to the specified values to determine which partition should contain a specific row. See below for details.
trans-unit.target: 所有指定的列与指定的值进行比较,以确定哪个分区应该包含特定的行。详情请看下文。

trans-unit.source: All the steps are the same, since an index is essentially a "table" except that the "data" is a copy of the PRIMARY KEY.
trans-unit.target: 所有的步骤都是一样的,因为索引本质上是一个 "表",只是 "数据 "是PRIMARY KEY的副本。

trans-unit.source: All these can be combined or transformed by further SQL operations. This makes working with CONNECT much more flexible than just using the LOAD statement.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些都可以通过进一步的SQL操作进行组合或转换。这使使用CONNECT的工作比仅使用LOAD语句更加灵活。

trans-unit.source: All these literals are equivalent:
trans-unit.target: 这些文字都是等价的。

trans-unit.source: All these statements can also be executed inside a stored routine. However, only SHOW WARNINGS and SHOW ERRORS can be executed as a prepared statement. After an EXECUTE statement, the diagnostics area contains information about the prepared statement, if it produces error conditions.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些语句也可以在存储的例程中执行。但是，只有SHOW WARNINGS和SHOW ERRORS可以作为准备好的语句执行。EXECUTE语句之后，如果它会产生错误条件，则诊断区域包含有关已准备语句的信息。

trans-unit.source: All these statements cause an implicit commit before execution. This means that, even if the statement fails with an error, the transaction is committed. Some of them, like CREATE TABLE ... SELECT, also cause a commit immediatly after execution. Such statements couldn't be rollbacked in any case.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些语句在执行之前都会导致隐式提交。这意味着，即使语句因错误而失败，事务也会被提交。其中一些，例如 CREATE TABLE ... SELECT ，也将在执行后立即引起提交。在任何情况下都不能回滚这样的语句。

trans-unit.source: All this can be avoided and optimized by forcing the query to be locally executed on each server and retrieving only the small results of the group by queries. Here is how to do it. For each remote machine, create a table that will retrieve the locally executed query. For instance for m1:
trans-unit.target: 通过强制在每台服务器上本地执行查询,并通过查询只检索组的小结果,可以避免和优化这一切。下面是如何做到这一点。对于每台远程机器,创建一个表,检索本地执行的查询。例如对于m1。

trans-unit.source: All this is mostly useful when creating a table on a remote file that you cannot easily see.
trans-unit.target: 当在远程文件上创建一个你不容易看到的表时,所有这些主要是有用的。

trans-unit.source: All this is targeted at running joins which touch small fraction of the tables. The expected typical use-case looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 所有这些都是针对运行连接,而连接的表只有很小的一部分。预期的典型用例是这样的。

trans-unit.source: All user accounts, passwords, and global privileges are now stored in the mysql.global_priv table. The mysql.user table still exists and has exactly the same set of columns as before, but it’s now a view that references the mysql.global_priv table. Tools that analyze the mysql.user table should continue to workas before.
trans-unit.target: 现在，所有用户帐户，密码和全局特权都存储在 mysql.global_priv 表中。该 mysql.user 表仍然存在，像以前一样具有完全相同的一组列，但它现在是一个观点，即引用 mysql.global_priv 表。分析 mysql.user 表的工具应像以前一样继续工作。

trans-unit.source: All values must be specified as literals, not expressions. The value of a boolean option may be specified as one of YES, NO, ON, OFF, 1, or 0. A string value may be specified either quoted or not, as an identifier (if it is a valid identifier, of course). Compare with the old behavior:
trans-unit.target: 所有的值都必须指定为字面值,而不是表达式。布林选项的值可以指定为 YES、NO、ON、OFF、1 或 0 中的一个。 字符串的值可以指定为引号或不引号,作为标识符(当然,如果它是一个有效的标识符)。与以前的行为相比。

trans-unit.source: All your old clients and connectors (PHP, Perl, Python, Java, etc.) will work unchanged (no need to recompile). This works because MariaDB and MySQL use the same client protocol and the client libraries are binary compatible. You can also use your old MySQL connector packages with MariaDB if you want.
trans-unit.target: 您所有的旧客户端和连接器(PHP、Perl、Python、Java等)都将保持不变地工作(无需重新编译)。这是因为MariaDB和MySQL使用相同的客户端协议,并且客户端库是二进制兼容的。如果你愿意,你也可以在MariaDB中使用你的旧MySQL连接器包。

trans-unit.source: Allocate any required memory. To verify that the arguments are of a required type or, alternatively, to tell MySQL to coerce arguments to the required types when the main function is called.
trans-unit.target: 分配任何需要的内存。验证参数是否为所需类型,或者,告诉MySQL在调用主函数时将参数强制为所需类型。

trans-unit.source: Allocating RAM for MariaDB - The Short Answer
trans-unit.target: 为MariaDB分配RAM--简单的回答

trans-unit.source: Allow 'any' length transactions to work (Having long running transactions will cause more log space to be used).
trans-unit.target: 允许 "任何 "长度的事务工作(长期运行的事务将导致更多的日志空间被使用)。

trans-unit.source: Allow anonymous users
trans-unit.target: 允许匿名用户

trans-unit.source: Allow any day between 1-31 in the day part. This is convenient when you want to read in all (including wrong data) into the database and then manipulate it there.
trans-unit.target: 在day部分允许输入1-31之间的任何一天。当你想把所有的数据(包括错误的数据)读入数据库,然后在那里进行操作时,这很方便。

trans-unit.source: Allow copying of Aria tables between different Aria servers (under some well-defined constraints).
trans-unit.target: 允许在不同的Aria服务器之间复制Aria表(在一些明确定义的约束条件下)。

trans-unit.source: Allow creation of column names that are keywords. This works by prefixing each column name with the table name.
trans-unit.target: 允许创建作为关键字的列名。这通过在每个列名前加上表名来实现。

trans-unit.source: Allow duplicate names for subpatterns
trans-unit.target: 允许子模式的重复名称

trans-unit.source: Allow log shipping; that is, you can do incremental backups of Aria tables just by copying the Aria logs.
trans-unit.target: 允许日志运输;也就是说,只要复制Aria日志,就可以对Aria表进行增量备份。

trans-unit.source: Allow one to have spaces (including tab characters and new line characters) between function name and '('. The drawback is that this causes built in functions to become reserved words.
trans-unit.target: 允许在函数名称和'（'之间使用空格（包括制表符和换行符）。缺点是这会使内置函数成为保留字。

trans-unit.source: Allow only those UPDATE and DELETE statements that specify which rows to modify by using key values. If you have set this option in an option file, you can override it by using --safe-updates on the command line. See using the --safe-updates option for more.
trans-unit.target: 仅允许那些使用键值指定要修改哪些行的UPDATE和DELETE语句。如果已在选项文件中设置此选项，则可以在命令行上使用 --safe-updates 覆盖它。有关更多信息，请参见使用--safe-updates选项。

trans-unit.source: Allow remote access for root user
trans-unit.target: 允许root用户远程访问

trans-unit.source: Allow remote access from network for user root
trans-unit.target: 允许用户root从网络远程访问

trans-unit.source: Allow replication from one master to one slave in many threads
trans-unit.target: 允许在多个线程中从一个主线程复制到一个从线程。

trans-unit.source: Allow tests marked as "big" to run. Tests can be thus marked by including the line --source include/big_test.inc, and they will only be run if this option is given, or if the environment variable BIG_TEST is set to 1. Repeat this option twice to run only "big" tests. This is typically used for tests that take a very long to run, or that use many resources, so that they are not suitable for running as part of a normal test suite run
trans-unit.target: 允许标记为“大”的测试运行。因此，可以通过包含 --source include/big_test.inc 行来标记测试，并且只有在指定了此选项或环境变量BIG_TEST设置为1的情况下，才可以运行测试。重复两次此选项以仅运行“ big” ”测试。通常用于运行时间很长的测试，或者使用许多资源的测试，因此它们不适合作为普通测试套件运行的一部分运行

trans-unit.source: Allow the contents of one or more master servers to be mirrored on one or more slave servers.
trans-unit.target: 允许一个或多个主服务器的内容在一个或多个从服务器上进行镜像。

trans-unit.source: Allowable values are:
trans-unit.target: 允许值为:

trans-unit.source: Allowing Access to the Tmpfs File Context
trans-unit.target: 允许访问Tmpfs文件上下文

trans-unit.source: Allowing concurrent DML during the operation does not solve all problems. When a column was added to a table with the older in-place optimization, the resulting table rebuild could still significantly increase the I/O and memory consumption and cause replication lag.
trans-unit.target: 在操作过程中允许并发DML并不能解决所有问题。当一列被添加到一个使用旧的原地优化的表中时,所产生的表重建仍然会显著增加I/O和内存消耗,并导致复制滞后。

trans-unit.source: Allows --copy-back or --move-back command options to use non-empty target directories.
trans-unit.target: 允许 --copy-back 或 --move-back 命令选项使用非空目标目录。

trans-unit.source: Allows reference to subqueries as temporary tables within queries.
trans-unit.target: 允许在查询中引用子查询作为临时表。

trans-unit.source: Allows the creation of password validation plugins to check user passwords as they are set.
trans-unit.target: 允许创建密码验证插件,检查用户密码的设置情况。

trans-unit.source: Allows using the pipe character (ASCII 124) as string concatenation operator. This means that "A" || "B" can be used in place of CONCAT("A", "B").
trans-unit.target: 允许使用管道字符（ASCII 124）作为字符串连接运算符。这意味着 "A" || "B" 可以使用“ B”代替 CONCAT("A", "B") 。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to access a collection of identical MyISAM tables as one.
trans-unit.target: 允许你访问一个相同的MyISAM表的集合。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to access tables in other MariaDB or MySQL servers.
trans-unit.target: 允许你访问其他MariaDB或MySQL服务器中的表。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to combine data from different sources.
trans-unit.target: 允许您合并不同来源的数据。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to modify the type of a column. The column will be at the same place as the original column and all indexes on the column will be kept. Note that when modifying column, you should specify all attributes for the new column.
trans-unit.target: 允许您修改列的类型。该列的位置将与原列相同,并且保留该列上的所有索引。注意,修改列时,应指定新列的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: Almost all functions returning a json string - whose name begins with Json_ - have a counterpart with a name beginning with Jbin_. This is both for performance (speed and memory) as well as for better control of what the functions should do.
trans-unit.target: 几乎所有返回json字符串（名称以Json_开头）的函数都有一个名称以Jbin_开头的副本。这既是为了提高性能（速度和内存），又是为了更好地控制功能应该做什么。

trans-unit.source: Almost all the work will be done on the remote machines, simultaneously thanks to the thread option, making this query super-fast even on big tables placed on many remote machines.
trans-unit.target: 由于有了线程选项,几乎所有的工作都会在远程机器上同时完成,这使得这个查询速度超快,即使是放在多台远程机器上的大表。

trans-unit.source: Along with the following Base R reference card: R Reference Card v2
trans-unit.target: 连同以下Base R参考卡：R Reference Card v2

trans-unit.source: Alpha
trans-unit.target: Alpha

trans-unit.source: Alphabet value 63 is encoded as '/'.
trans-unit.target: 字母值63被编码为'/'。

trans-unit.source: Alphabet value 64 is encoded as '+'.
trans-unit.target: 字母值64被编码为'+'。

trans-unit.source: Alphabetic
trans-unit.target: Alphabetic

trans-unit.source: Alphabetical List
trans-unit.target: 按字母顺序排列

trans-unit.source: Alphabetical list of all mysqld Options, Server System Variables and Server Status Variables. The convention used is that variable names are listed with '_' and options with '-'. If a variable and option both exist, both versions are listed for easy searching.
trans-unit.target: 所有mysqld选项，服务器系统变量和服务器状态变量的字母顺序列表。使用的约定是变量名以“ _”列出，选项以“-”列出。如果同时存在变量和选项，则会列出两个版本以便于搜索。

trans-unit.source: Alphanumeric
trans-unit.target: Alphanumeric

trans-unit.source: Alphanumeric: union of properties L and N
trans-unit.target: 字母数字:属性L和N的结合。

trans-unit.source: Also I do not know if all datatypes in Oracle-MySQL are supported by MariaDB. For example, tinyint, bigint. (Sincerly, I know that MariaDB understand these datatypes, but I wonder if they have the same definition as given by the Oracle-MySQL-site.) Thanks for help
trans-unit.target: 另外,我不知道Oracle-MySQL中的所有数据类型是否都被MariaDB支持。例如,tinyint,bigint。(诚恳的说,我知道MariaDB理解这些数据类型,但我不知道它们是否和Oracle-MySQL网站给出的定义一样。)谢谢你的帮助

trans-unit.source: Also has the effect of silently converting TIMESTAMP fields into DATETIME fields when created or modified.
trans-unit.target: 在创建或修改时，还具有将TIMESTAMP字段静默转换为DATETIME字段的作用。

trans-unit.source: Also in the /var/log/mariadb/columnstore directory, there are a few other logs that are kept:
trans-unit.target: 另外在/var/log/mariadb/columnstore目录下,还有一些其他的日志被保存。

trans-unit.source: Also make sure that the file .my.cnf doesn't exist if no password is setup.

trans-unit.source: Although CONNECT provides a rich set of table types, specific applications may need to access data organized in a way that is not handled by its existing foreign data wrappers (FDW). To handle these cases, CONNECT features an interface that enables developers to implement in C++ the required table wrapper and use it as if it were part of the standard CONNECT table type list. CONNECT can use these additional handlers providing the corresponding external module (dll or shared lib) be available.
trans-unit.target: 虽然CONNECT提供了一组丰富的表类型,但特定的应用程序可能需要访问以其现有的外来数据包装器(FDW)无法处理的方式组织的数据。为了处理这些情况,CONNECT提供了一个接口,使开发人员能够在C++中实现所需的表包装器,并将其作为标准CONNECT表类型列表的一部分来使用。CONNECT可以使用这些额外的处理程序,但必须提供相应的外部模块(dll或共享lib)。

trans-unit.source: Although MariaDB considers a user as the combination of the username and hostname, the Audit Plugin logs only based on the username. MariaDB uses both the username and hostname so as to grant privileges relevant to the location of the user. Privileges are not relevant though for tracing the access to database objects. The host name is still recorded in the log, but logging is not determined based on that information.
trans-unit.target: 虽然MariaDB将用户视为用户名和主机名的组合,但Audit Plugin仅根据用户名进行记录。MariaDB同时使用用户名和主机名,以便授予与用户位置相关的权限。虽然权限与追踪数据库对象的访问无关。主机名仍然会被记录在日志中,但日志记录并不是基于该信息来确定的。

trans-unit.source: Although data is written twice, the doublewrite buffer does not require twice as much I/O, as data is written to the buffer in a large sequential chunk with a single fsync() call. There is extra time consumed however, and the effect becomes visible with fast storage and a heavy write load.
trans-unit.target: 虽然数据被写入两次,但双写缓冲区并不需要两倍的I/O,因为数据是以一个大的顺序块写入缓冲区的,只需调用一次fsync()。不过会有额外的时间消耗,在存储速度快、写入负载大的情况下,效果就会显现出来。

trans-unit.source: Although date and time information can be represented in both CHAR and INTEGER data types, the DATE data type has special associated properties. For each DATE value, CONNECT can store all or only some of the following information: century, year, month, day, hour, minute, and second.
trans-unit.target: 虽然日期和时间信息可以用CHAR和INTEGER数据类型表示,但DATE数据类型具有特殊的相关属性。对于每个DATE值,CONNECT可以存储全部或仅存储以下部分信息:世纪、年、月、日、时、分、秒。

trans-unit.source: Although enabled in versions prior to MariaDB 10.1.7, the query_cache_size is by default 0KB there, which effectively disables the query cache. From 10.1.7 on the cache size defaults to 1MB. If needed set the cache to a size large enough amount, for example:

trans-unit.source: Although hardware bottlenecks often fall elsewhere, faster processors allow calculations to be performed more quickly, and the results sent back to the client more quickly. Besides processor speed, the processor's bus speed and cache size are also important factors to consider.
trans-unit.target: 虽然硬件瓶颈往往落在其他地方,但更快的处理器可以让计算更快地执行,并更快地将结果发回客户端。除了处理器的速度,处理器的总线速度和缓存大小也是需要考虑的重要因素。

trans-unit.source: Although mysqldump will by default preserve your resources for regular spindle disks and low-core hardware, this doesn't mean that concurrent dumps cannot benefit from hardware architecture like SAN, flash storage, low write workload. The back-up time would benefit from a tool such as MyDumper.
trans-unit.target: 虽然mysqldump默认会为普通主轴磁盘和低核硬件保存资源,但这并不意味着并发转储不能从SAN、闪存存储、低写工作量等硬件架构中获益。备份时间将受益于MyDumper这样的工具。

trans-unit.source: Although such functions written by other parties do exist,[2] CONNECT provides its own UDFs that are specifically adapted to the JSON table type and easily available because, being inside the CONNECT library or DLL, they require no additional module to be loaded (see CONNECT - Compiling JSON UDFs in a Separate Library to make these functions in a separate library module).
trans-unit.target: 尽管确实存在其他各方编写的此类函数，但[ 2 ] CONNECT提供了自己的UDF，这些UDF特别适合JSON表类型并且易于使用，因为它们位于CONNECT库或DLL中，不需要加载其他模块（请参见CONNECT-在单独的库中编译JSON UDF，以在单独的库模块中实现这些功能）。

trans-unit.source: Although the Galera provider certifies the write set associated with a transaction at commit time on each node in the cluster, this write set is not necessarily applied on that cluster node immediately. Instead, the write set is placed in the cluster node's receive queue on the node, and it is eventually applied by one of the cluster node's Galera slave thread.
trans-unit.target: 尽管Galera提供程序在提交时在群集中的每个节点上证明了与事务关联的写集，但是不一定要立即在该群集节点上应用此写集。而是将写集放置在该节点上群集节点的接收队列中，并最终由群集节点的Galera从属线程之一应用它。

trans-unit.source: Although the JSON UDF’s can be nicely included in the CONNECT library module, there are cases when you may need to have them in a separate library.
trans-unit.target: 尽管JSON UDF可以很好地包含在CONNECT库模块中，但是在某些情况下，您可能需要将它们放在单独的库中。

trans-unit.source: Although the JSON UDFs can be nicely included in the CONNECT library module, there are cases when you may need to have them in a separate library.
trans-unit.target: 虽然JSON UDF可以很好地包含在CONNECT库模块中,但在某些情况下,您可能需要在一个单独的库中拥有它们。

trans-unit.target: 尽管在大多数情况下，server_audit_syslog_facility和server_audit_syslog_priority的默认值应该足够，但是可以根据 syslog.h 中对 openlog() 和 syslog() 函数的定义进行更改。

trans-unit.source: Although the discussion in this section talks about DELETE, it can be used for any other "chunking", such as, say, UPDATE, or SELECT plus some complex processing.
trans-unit.target: 虽然本节讨论的是DELETE,但它可以用于任何其他的 "分块",比如说,UPDATE,或者SELECT加上一些复杂的处理。

trans-unit.source: Although the field representation is always text in the table file, you can freely choose the corresponding column type, characters, date, integer or floating point according to its contents.
trans-unit.target: 虽然表文件中的字段表示方式始终是文本,但可以根据其内容自由选择相应的列类型,字符、日期、整数或浮点。

trans-unit.source: Although the plugin's shared library is distributed with MariaDB by default as auth_ed25519.so or auth_ed25519.dll depending on the operating system, the plugin is not actually installed by MariaDB by default. There are two methods that can be used to install the plugin with MariaDB.

trans-unit.source: An IN parameter passes a value into a procedure. The procedure might modify the value, but the modification is not visible to the caller when the procedure returns. An OUT parameter passes a value from the procedure back to the caller. Its initial value is NULL within the procedure, and its value is visible to the caller when the procedure returns. An INOUT parameter is initialized by the caller, can be modified by the procedure, and any change made by the procedure is visible to the caller when the procedure returns.
trans-unit.target: 的 IN 参数传送一个值的过程。该过程可能会修改该值，但是该过程返回时，调用者看不到该修改。一个 OUT 参数传送从过程返回给调用者的值。在过程中，其初始值为NULL，并且在过程返回时，调用者可以看到其初始值。一个 INOUT 参数由呼叫者初始化，可以由程序进行修改，并且由所述方法制备的任何变化是可见的呼叫者时，过程返回。

trans-unit.source: An AUTO_INCREMENT column normally has missing values. This happens because if a row is deleted, or an AUTO_INCREMENT value is explicitly updated, old values are never re-used. The REPLACE statement also deletes a row, and its value is wasted. With InnoDB, values can be reserved by a transaction; but if the transaction fails (for example, because of a ROLLBACK) the reserved value will be lost.
trans-unit.target: AUTO_INCREMENT列通常会有缺失的值。发生这种情况的原因是,如果删除了一条记录,或者显式更新了AUTO_INCREMENT的值,旧的值永远不会被重新使用。REPLACE语句也会删除一条记录,它的值就被浪费了。在InnoDB中,可以通过事务来保留值;但是如果事务失败(例如,因为ROLLBACK),保留的值就会丢失。

This may be confusing, because the empty string is also a possible value, and the only difference if that in this case its index is not 0. Inserting will fail with an error if strict mode is active.

trans-unit.source: An additional source of speedup is this property: if there are multiple records in t1 that have the same value of t1.col1, then regular Nested-Loops join will make multiple index lookups for the same value of t2.key1=t1.col1. The lookups may or may not hit the cache, depending on how big the join is. With Batched Key Access and Multi-Range Read, no duplicate index lookups will be made.
trans-unit.target: 加速的另一个来源是此属性：如果 t1 中有多个记录，且它们具有相同的 t1.col1 值，则常规的Nested-Loops连接将对相同的 t2.key1=t1.col1 值进行多个索引查找。查找是否可以命中缓存，具体取决于联接的大小。使用批处理密钥访问和多范围读取，将不会进行重复的索引查找。

trans-unit.source: An easy way to avoid this is by increasing the value of the innodb_old_blocks_time system variable. It represents the number of milliseconds that must pass before a recently accessed page can be put into the "new" sublist in the buffer pool. Data which is accessed only once should remain in the "old" sublist. This means that they will soon be evicted from the buffer pool. Since during the backup process the "old" sublist is likely to store data that is not useful, one could also consider resizing it by changing the value of the innodb_old_blocks_pct system variable.
trans-unit.target: 避免这种情况的一种简单方法是增加innodb_old_blocks_time系统变量的值。它表示在将最近访问的页面放入缓冲池的“新”子列表之前必须经过的毫秒数。仅访问一次的数据应保留在“旧”子列表中。这意味着它们很快将被从缓冲池中逐出。由于在备份过程中，“旧”子列表可能会存储无用的数据，因此还可以考虑通过更改innodb_old_blocks_pct系统变量的值来调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: An indexed created as “dynamic” is a standard index which, in some cases, can be reconstructed for a specific query. This happens in particular for some queries where two tables are joined by an indexed key column. If the “from” table is big and the “to” big table reduced in size because of a where clause, it can be worthwhile to reconstruct the index on this reduced table.
trans-unit.target: 创建为“动态”的索引是标准索引，在某些情况下，可以针对特定查询进行重建。对于某些通过索引键列将两个表连接在一起的查询，尤其会发生这种情况。如果“ from”表很大并且由于“ where”子句而使“ to”大表的大小减小，则值得在此减小的表上重建索引。

trans-unit.source: An issue with libxml2 is that some files can declare a default name space in their root node. Because Xpath only searches in that name space, the nodes will not be found if they are not prefixed. If this happens, specify the tabname option as an Xpath ignoring the current name space:
trans-unit.target: libxml2的一个问题是,有些文件可以在其根节点中声明一个默认的名字空间。因为Xpath只在该名称空间中搜索,所以如果节点没有前缀,就不会被找到。如果发生这种情况,将tabname选项指定为忽略当前名称空间的Xpath。

trans-unit.source: An issue, when creating a WMI table, is to make its column definition. Indeed, even when you know the namespace and the class for the wanted information, it is not easy to find what are the names and types of its properties. However, because CONNECT can retrieve this information from the WMI provider, you can simply omit defining columns and CONNECT will do the job.
trans-unit.target: 当创建一个WMI表时,一个问题是要对其列进行定义。事实上,即使你知道了想要的信息的命名空间和类,也不容易找到它的属性名称和类型是什么。但是,由于CONNECT可以从WMI提供者那里检索到这些信息,所以你可以简单地省略定义列,CONNECT会完成这项工作。

trans-unit.source: An old version of mysqlbinlog can read binlog files produced by a new server version if checksums were disabled when the log was produced. Old versions of mysqlbinlog reading a new binlog file containing checksums will be confused, and output will be garbled, with the added checksums being interpreted as extra garbage at the end of query strings and similar entries. No error will be reported in this case, just wrong output.
trans-unit.target: 如果在生成日志时禁用了校验和，则旧版本的 mysqlbinlog 可以读取新服务器版本生成的binlog文件。读取新的包含校验和的binlog文件的 mysqlbinlog 的旧版本将被混淆，并且输出将出现乱码，添加的校验和将在查询字符串和类似条目的末尾被解释为额外的垃圾。在这种情况下，不会报告错误，只是输出错误。

trans-unit.source: An optional display width may be added to the BIGINT, INTEGER/INT, SMALLINT & TINYINT columns. As with core MariaDB tables, this value does not affect the internal storage requirements of the column nor does it affect the valid value ranges.
trans-unit.target: 可以在BIGINT，INTEGER / INT，SMALLINT和TINYINT列中添加可选的显示宽度。与核心MariaDB表一样，此值既不影响列的内部存储需求，也不影响有效值范围。

trans-unit.source: An optional length M can be given for this type. If this is done, MariaDB creates the column as the smallest BLOB type large enough to hold values M bytes long.
trans-unit.target: 可以为该类型指定一个可选的长度 M 。如果这样做，MariaDB将列创建为最小的 BLOB 类型，其大小足以容纳 M 个字节长的值。

trans-unit.source: An optional length M can be given for this type. If this is done, MariaDB creates the column as the smallest TEXT type large enough to hold values M characters long.
trans-unit.target: 可以为该类型指定一个可选的长度 M 。如果这样做，MariaDB将列创建为最小的 TEXT 类型，其大小足以容纳 M 个字符长的值。

trans-unit.source: An optional second argument gives a timeout in seconds. If the timeout expires before the specified GTID position is reached, then the function returns -1. Passing NULL or a negative number for the timeout means no timeout, and the function will wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数给出了以秒为单位的超时时间,如果超时时间在达到指定的GTID位置之前结束,那么函数返回-1。如果在到达指定的GTID位置之前超时,那么函数返回-1。传递NULL或负数表示没有超时,函数将无限期地等待。

trans-unit.source: An optional user password.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的用户密码。

trans-unit.source: An orphan intermediate table may prevent you from dropping the tablespace even if it is otherwise empty, and generally takes up unnecessary space.
trans-unit.target: 孤儿中间表可能会阻止你放弃表空间,即使它在其他方面是空的,通常会占用不必要的空间。

trans-unit.source: An overlay can replace almost any file in the overlaid suite, or add new files. For example, if some overlay of the main suite contains a include/have_innodb.inc file, then all tests that include it will see and use the overlaid version. Or, an overlay can create a t/create.opt file (even though the main suite does not have such a file), and create.test will be executed with the specified additional options.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖可以替换覆盖套件中的几乎所有文件，也可以添加新文件。例如，如果主套件的某些覆盖包含一个 include/have_innodb.inc 文件，那么包含该套件的所有测试都将看到并使用覆盖的版本。或者，覆盖层可以创建一个 t/create.opt 文件（即使主套件没有这样的文件），并且 create.test 将使用指定的其他选项执行。

trans-unit.source: An overlay is like a second transparent layer in a graphics editor. It can obscure, extend, or modify the background image. Also, one may notice that an overlay is very close to a UnionFS, but implemented in perl inside mtr.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖层就像图形编辑器中的第二个透明层。它可以遮盖，扩展或修改背景图像。另外，您可能会注意到，覆盖层非常接近UnionFS，但是在mtr内部的perl中实现。

trans-unit.source: Anchored data types allow a data type to be defined based on another object, such as a table row, rather than specifically set in the declaration. If the anchor object changes, so will the anchored data type. This can lead to routines being easier to maintain, so that if the data type in the table is changed, it will automatically be changed in the routine as well.
trans-unit.target: 锚定数据类型允许基于另一个对象(如表行)来定义数据类型,而不是在声明中特别设置。如果锚定对象发生变化,锚定的数据类型也会发生变化。这可以使例程更容易维护,这样如果表中的数据类型发生变化,例程中也会自动改变。

trans-unit.source: Anonymous accounts are accounts where the user name portion of the account name is empty. These accounts act as special catch-all accounts. If a user attempts to log into the system from a host, and an anonymous account exists with a host name portion that matches the user's host, then the user will log in as the anonymous account if there is no more specific account match for the user name that the user entered.
trans-unit.target: 匿名账户是指账户名的用户名部分为空的账户。这些账户作为特殊的万能账户。如果用户试图从主机登录系统,而存在一个匿名账户,其主机名部分与用户的主机相匹配,那么如果用户输入的用户名没有更具体的账户匹配,用户将以匿名账户登录。

trans-unit.source: Another Algorithm
trans-unit.target: 另一种算法

trans-unit.source: Another MariaDB extension allows to version only a subset of columns in a table. This is useful, for example, if you have a table with user information that should be versioned, but one column is, let's say, a login counter that is incremented often and is not interesting to version. Such a column can be excluded from versioning by declaring it WITHOUT VERSIONING
trans-unit.target: 另一个MariaDB扩展只允许对表中列的子集进行版本控制。例如，如果您有一个表，其中应包含要进行版本控制的用户信息，则此功能很有用，例如，一列是一个登录计数器，该计数器经常增加并且对版本不感兴趣。可以通过声明 WITHOUT VERSIONING 版本将其排除在版本控制之外

trans-unit.source: Another approach
trans-unit.target: 另一种方法

trans-unit.source: Another common opportunity for out-of-order parallel replication comes in connection with multi-source replication. Suppose we have two different masters M1 and M2, and we are using multi-source replication to have S1 as a slave of both M1 and M2. S1 will apply events received from M1 in parallel with events received from M2. If we now have a third-level slave S2 that replicates from S1 as master, we want S2 to also be able to apply events that originated on M1 in parallel with events that originated on M2. This can be achieved with out-of-order parallel replication, by setting gtid_domain_id different on M1 and M2.
trans-unit.target: 乱序并行复制的另一个常见机会是与多源复制有关。假设我们有两个不同的主服务器M1和M2，并且我们正在使用多源复制使S1作为M1和M2的从服务器。 S1将同时应用从M1接收的事件和从M2接收的事件。如果现在有一个从S1复制为主设备的三级从属S2，我们希望S2还能够将源自M1的事件与源自M2的事件并行应用。通过在M1和M2上设置 gtid_domain_id 不同，可以使用无序并行复制来实现。

trans-unit.source: Another common use is to include a counter in a query:
trans-unit.target: 另一个常见的用法是在查询中包含一个计数器。

trans-unit.source: Another example, WMI table
trans-unit.target: 另一个例子,WMI表

trans-unit.source: Another format exists, noted by Pretty=1, which is similar to this one but has some additions to represent a JSON array. A header and a trailer records are added containing the opening and closing square bracket, and all records but the last are followed by a comma. It has the same advantages for reading and updating, but inserting and deleting are executed in the pretty=2 way.
trans-unit.target: 还有一种格式存在,由Pretty=1指出,它与这个格式类似,但增加了一些表示JSON数组的内容。增加了一个头部和一个预告片记录,包含开头和结尾的方括号,除了最后一条记录外,所有记录后面都有一个逗号。它在读取和更新方面有同样的优势,但插入和删除是以pret=2的方式执行的。

trans-unit.source: Another good workaround is to replace within the correlated sub-query the ODBC table by a local copy of it because MariaDB is often able to optimize the query and to provide a very fast execution.
trans-unit.target: 另一个很好的变通方法是在相关的子查询中,用ODBC表的本地副本来替换它,因为MariaDB通常能够优化查询,并提供一个非常快速的执行。

trans-unit.source: Another issue when dealing with ODBC tables is the way table and column names are handled regarding of the case.
trans-unit.target: 在处理ODBC表时,另一个问题是表和列名的处理方式。

trans-unit.source: Another kind of file to consider when troubleshooting is option files. The default option file is called my.cnf. Option files contain configuration options, such as the location of the data directory mentioned above. If you're unsure where the option file is located, see Configuring MariaDB with Option Files: Default Option File Locations for information on the default locations.
trans-unit.target: 故障排除时要考虑的另一种文件是选项文件。默认选项文件名为 my.cnf 。选项文件包含配置选项，例如上述数据目录的位置。如果不确定选项文件的位置，请参阅使用选项文件配置MariaDB：默认选项文件位置，以获取有关默认位置的信息。

trans-unit.source: Another major benefit of using INSERT DELAYED is that inserts from many clients are bundled together and written in one block. This is much faster than performing many separate inserts.
trans-unit.target: 使用 INSERT DELAYED 的另一个主要好处是，来自许多客户端的插入被捆绑在一起并写在一个块中。这比执行许多单独的插入要快得多。

trans-unit.source: Another major limitation of FEDERATED is to access only one table. By combining TBL and MYSQL tables, CONNECT enables to access a collection of local or remote tables as one table. Of course the sub-tables can be on different servers. With one SELECT statement, a company manager will be able to interrogate results coming from all of his subsidiary computers. This is great for distribution, banking, and many other industries.
trans-unit.target: FEDERATED的另一大限制是只能访问一张表。通过结合TBL和MYSQL表,CONNECT可以将本地或远程表的集合作为一个表来访问。当然子表可以在不同的服务器上。通过一个SELECT语句,一个公司经理将能够查询来自其所有子公司计算机的结果。这对于分销、银行和许多其他行业来说是非常好的。

trans-unit.source: Another option exists, phpos, enabling to specify what place holders are present and in what order. To be specified as “W”, “WH”, “H”, or “HW”. It is rarely used because by default CONNECT can set it from the srcdef content. The only cases it is needed is when the srcdef contains only a having place holder or when the having place holder occurs before the where place holder, which can occur on queries containing joins. CONNECT cannot handle more than one place holder of each type.
trans-unit.target: 存在另一个选项phpos，它可以指定存在哪些占位符以及以什么顺序出现。被指定为“ W”，“ WH”，“ H”或“ HW”。很少使用它，因为默认情况下CONNECT可以从srcdef内容进行设置。唯一需要的情况是srcdef仅包含一个占位符，或者该占位符出现在where占位符之前，这可能发生在包含联接的查询中。CONNECT不能处理每种类型的多个占位符。

trans-unit.source: Another suggestion... If you are rolling up over a big span of time (eg hourly -> monthly), the bit strings must all be the same length, and the monthly string must be big enough to handle the expected count. This is likely to lead to very sparse hourly bit strings. Hence, it may be prudent to compress the hourly stings.
trans-unit.target: 另一个建议...如果您要跨很大的时间范围（例如，每小时->每月），则位字符串必须都具有相同的长度，并且每月字符串必须足够大以处理预期的计数。这很可能导致小时比特串非常稀疏。因此，压缩小时刺痛可能是明智的。

trans-unit.source: Any UPDATE, DELETE, etc with LIMIT that is replicated to slaves (via Statement Based Replication) may cause inconsistencies between the Master and Slaves. This is because the actual order of the records discovered for updating/deleting may be different on the slave, thereby leading to a different subset being modified. To be safe, add ORDER BY to such statements. Moreover, be sure the ORDER BY is deterministic -- that is, the fields/expressions in the ORDER BY are unique.
trans-unit.target: 复制到从服务器（通过基于语句的复制）的任何带有LIMIT的UPDATE，DELETE等都可能导致主服务器和从服务器之间的不一致。这是因为发现的用于更新/删除的记录的实际顺序在从属服务器上可能有所不同，从而导致修改了另一个子集。为了安全起见，请将ORDER BY添加到此类语句中。此外，请确保ORDER BY是确定性的-也就是说，ORDER BY中的字段/表达式是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Any Unix user in the Unix group dba should be mapped to the MariaDB user dba. (@dba: dba)
trans-unit.target: Unix组 dba 中的任何Unix用户都应映射到MariaDB用户 dba 。（ @dba: dba ）

trans-unit.source: Any change to a query (even adding a space) leads (potentially) to a different entry in the QC.
trans-unit.target: 对查询的任何更改(甚至是添加一个空格)都会导致(可能)在QC中出现不同的条目。

trans-unit.target: 任何灵活长度类型的字段值在最大字段大小之前都不会再被0填充。

trans-unit.source: Any of SQL expression that can be calculated from a single row fields is allowed. Subqueries are allowed. The AS keyword is allowed, so it is possible to use aliases.
trans-unit.target: 允许从单行字段计算的SQL表达式。允许使用子查询。允许使用AS关键字,所以可以使用别名。

trans-unit.source: Any page from a file can be placed into a buffer of only one segment. The number of the segment is calculated from the file number and the position of the page in the file, and it's always the same for the page. Pages are evenly distributed among segments.
trans-unit.target: 一个文件中的任何一个页面都只能放入一个段的缓冲区中。段号是根据文件号和页面在文件中的位置计算出来的,对于页面来说,段号总是相同的。页面在各段中均匀分布。

trans-unit.target: 任何试图更新任何表的语句

trans-unit.source: Any statements that return a result set are not permitted. For example, a regular SELECTs is not permitted, but a SELECT INTO is. A cursor and FETCH statement is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允许任何返回结果集的语句。例如，不允许进行常规的SELECT，但是允许SELECT INTO。允许使用游标和FETCH语句。

trans-unit.source: Any table or view referred to in the definition must exist. However, after a view has been created, it is possible to drop a table or view that the definition refers to. In this case, use of the view results in an error. To check a view definition for problems of this kind, use the CHECK TABLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 定义中提到的任何表或视图必须存在。但是,在创建视图后,可以放弃定义中提到的表或视图。在这种情况下,使用视图会出现错误。要检查视图定义是否存在此类问题,请使用CHECK TABLE语句。

trans-unit.source: Any trailing spaces from SET and ENUM values are discarded.
trans-unit.target: SET和ENUM值中的所有尾随空格都将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Any transactional DML (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE) is allowed to run in parallel, up to the limit of @@slave_domain_parallel_threads. This may cause conflicts on the slave, eg. if two transactions try to modify the same row. Any such conflict is detected, and the latter of the two transactions is rolled back, allowing the former to proceed. The latter transaction is then re-tried once the former has completed.
trans-unit.target: 任何事务性DML（INSERT / UPDATE / DELETE）都可以并行运行，最大限制为@@ slave_domain_parallel_threads。例如，这可能导致从站发生冲突。如果两个事务尝试修改同一行。检测到任何此类冲突，然后回滚两个事务中的后者，从而允许前者继续进行。前者完成后，将重试后者的事务。

trans-unit.target: Aria

trans-unit.source: Aria 1.0 was basically a crash-safe non-transactional version of MyISAM. Aria 1.5 added more concurrency (multiple inserter) and some optimizations.
trans-unit.target: Aria 1.0基本上是MyISAM的崩溃安全非事务性版本。Aria 1.5增加了更多的并发性(多插入器)和一些优化。

trans-unit.source: Aria benchmarks

trans-unit.source: Aria can replay almost everything from the log. (Including CREATE, DROP, RENAME, TRUNCATE tables). Therefore, you make a backup of Aria by just copying the log. The things that can't be replayed (yet) are:
trans-unit.target: Aria可以重播日志中的几乎所有内容。（包括 CREATE ， DROP ， RENAME ， TRUNCATE 表）。因此，您只需复制日志即可备份Aria。尚无法重播的内容包括：

trans-unit.source: Aria data pages in block format have an overhead of 10 bytes/page and 5 bytes/row. Transaction and multiple concurrent-writer support will use an extra overhead of 7 bytes for new rows, 14 bytes for deleted rows and 0 bytes for old compacted rows.
trans-unit.target: 块格式的Aria数据页的开销为10字节/页和5字节/行。事务和多并发写入器支持将为新行使用7个字节的额外开销,为删除行使用14个字节的开销,为旧的压缩行使用0个字节的开销。

trans-unit.source: Aria does not currently support the ENCRYPTED table option. See MDEV-18049 about that.
trans-unit.target: Aria当前不支持 ENCRYPTED 表选项。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-18049。

trans-unit.source: Aria does not currently support the ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table option. See MDEV-18049 about that.
trans-unit.target: Aria当前不支持 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-18049。

trans-unit.source: Aria does not support multiple key caches.
trans-unit.target: Aria不支持多个密钥缓存。

trans-unit.source: Aria doesn't support INSERT DELAYED.
trans-unit.target: Aria不支持 INSERT DELAYED 。

trans-unit.source: Aria doesn't support MySQL internal RAID (disabled in MyISAM too, it's a deprecated feature).
trans-unit.target: Aria不支持MySQL内部RAID(在MyISAM中也被禁用了,这是一个过时的功能)。

trans-unit.source: Aria doesn't support indexes on virtual fields.
trans-unit.target: Aria不支持虚拟字段的索引。

trans-unit.source: Aria follows the same release criteria as for MariaDB. Some clarifications, unique for the Aria storage engine:
trans-unit.target: 晓月遵循相同的发布标准为MariaDB的。Aria存储引擎特有的一些说明：

trans-unit.source: Aria group commits for speeding up multi-user inserts
trans-unit.target: Aria集团承诺加快多用户插入速度

trans-unit.source: Aria has a log control file (aria_log_control) and log files (aria_log.%). The log files can be automatically purged when not needed or purged on demand (after backup).
trans-unit.target: Aria有一个日志控制文件（ aria_log_control ）和日志文件（ aria_log.% ）。不需要或需要时可以自动清除日志文件（备份后）。

trans-unit.source: Aria has one page size for both index and data (defined when Aria is used the first time). MyISAM supports different page sizes per index.
trans-unit.target: Aria对索引和数据都只有一个页面大小(第一次使用Aria时定义)。MyISAM支持每个索引的不同页面大小。

trans-unit.source: Aria has unit tests of most parts.
trans-unit.target: Aria的大部分部件都有单元测试。

trans-unit.source: Aria index and data file formats should be backwards and forwards compatible to ensure easy upgrades and downgrades.
trans-unit.target: Aria索引和数据文件格式应前后兼容,以确保易于升级和降级。

trans-unit.source: Aria is a crash safe MyISAM and more.
trans-unit.target: Aria是一款安全的MyISAM等巆。

trans-unit.source: Aria is a storage engine for MySQL® and MariaDB. It was originally developed with the goal of becoming the default transactional and non-transactional storage engine for MariaDB and MySQL.
trans-unit.target: Aria是MySQL®和MariaDB的存储引擎。它最初的开发目标是成为MariaDB和MySQL 的默认事务和非事务存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: Aria is now feature complete according to specification.
trans-unit.target: Aria现在已经按照规范完成了功能。

trans-unit.source: Aria storage engine
trans-unit.target: Aria存储引擎

trans-unit.source: Aria supports all aspects of MyISAM, except as noted below. This includes external and internal check/repair/compressing of rows, different row formats, different index compress formats, aria_chk etc. After a normal shutdown you can copy Aria files between servers.
trans-unit.target: 除以下所述，Aria支持MyISAM的所有方面。这包括行的外部和内部检查/修复/压缩，不同的行格式，不同的索引压缩格式， aria_chk 等。正常关闭后，您可以在服务器之间复制Aria文件。

trans-unit.source: Aria table information is stored in 2 files: the .MAI file contains base table information and the index and the .MAD file contains the data. aria_chk takes one or more .MAI files as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 咏叹调表信息存储在2个文件中： .MAI 文件包含基本表信息，而索引和 .MAD 文件包含数据。 aria_chk 使用一个或多个 .MAI 文件作为参数。

trans-unit.source: Aria uses 8K pages by default (MyISAM uses 1K). This makes Aria a bit faster when using keys of fixed size, but slower when using variable-length packed keys (until we add a directory to index pages).
trans-unit.target: Aria默认使用8K页(MyISAM使用1K)。这使得Aria在使用固定大小的键时速度更快一些,但在使用可变长度的打包键时速度更慢(直到我们添加一个目录到索引页)。

trans-unit.source: Aria uses BIG (1G by default) log files.
trans-unit.target: Aria使用BIG(默认为1G)日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Aria will automatically notice if you have copied a table from another system and do 'zerofill' for the first access of the table if it was not marked as 'movable'. The reason for using aria_chk --zerofill is that you avoid a delay in the MariaDB server for the first access of the table.
trans-unit.target: Aria将自动通知您是否已从另一个系统复制了一个表，如果未将该表标记为“可移动”，则对表的首次访问执行“ zerofill”。使用 aria_chk --zerofill 的原因是，可以避免在MariaDB服务器中首次访问表时出现延迟。
